public class UIArrangeTopDown
extends java.lang.Object

swapNodes

private void swapNodes(java.lang.String sNodeId,
                       java.lang.String sFirstParent,
                       java.lang.String sParent,
                       int i,
                       int nIndex)
Helper Method. To look for a node whose parent is placed above the parent of the current node in the same level and move it up.

Parameters:
sNodeId - The ID of the node which is compared to other nodes in the level
sFirstParent - The first parent ID of the node
sParent - The parent ID of the comparing node
i - Level at which the node is
nIndex - Index of the node in its parent's child vector
